amendment.description: To extend to current the Javits-Wagner-O'Day Act contracts for operation of military dining facilities a limitation on the applicability of the Randolph-Sheppard Act to the operation of such facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3325 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3325 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To extend to current the Javits-Wagner-O'Day Act contracts for operation of military dining facilities a limitation on the applicability of the Randolph-Sheppard Act to the operation of such facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3325 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3325 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
